en.name: Prototype Archaic
en.passiveDescription: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional {{240//300//360//420//480%}} ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

zh.name: 试作古华
zh.passiveDescription: 普通攻击和重击命中时，有50%的概率对小范围内的敌人造成{{240//300//360//420//480%}}攻击力的额外伤害。该效果每15秒只能触发一次。
